name: Socialgimme
tag_list: editor, create, pages, blogs, magazines, software, startup
overview:
The guys at Socialgimme believe that creating amazing stuff should be for everyone. No tech skills, no coding, just a creative mind and an interesting subject.

There are literally millions of websites that have been created before mobile devices kicked in. That means a transition is due on a global scale.

Now there are 2 ways to go about it.

Try to squeeze a current website into tablet/smartphone format. This will eliminate both readability and usability.

Pay a webdesign company a large sum of money to build a new website. This could have an impact on the companies cashflow, especially for small home business owners.

People don’t read websites, they scan them, even more now that over 50% browse the web on a mobile device like a tablet or a smartphone. Forget about 4 columns website, with 16 pages etc. Times have changed dramatically.

This is where Socialgimme can make a difference.

Determine unique sellings points, and create a Gimme page. Effortlessly add articles, images, video’s, banners, Social feeds, contact-forms, adsense and more at lightning speed, and single click enabled.

If someone wants to take it a step further, they can have all their Gimmes show up on their wall, herewith building an engaging relationship with subscribers to that wall, and monetize them.

Example of a Gimme wall: http://movie.socialgimme.com

To sum up, Socialgimme is there for everyone, whether it’s a large company, a small home business owner, of just any individual who wants to express themselves.

The future of webdesign is here, it’s called Socialgimme. ( or is that to cheesy ;-)
